definition: the act of catching an object with the hands, capture the attention or imagination of
details:
noun
- the act of catching an object with the hands
= synonyms: catch
- a mechanical device for gripping an object
verb
- capture the attention or imagination of
= example: capture the attention or imagination of
= synonyms: seize
- take or grasp suddenly
= example: take or grasp suddenly
- take hold of so as to seize or restrain or stop the motion of
= synonyms: catch
- make a grasping or snatching motion with the hand
= example: make a grasping or snatching motion with the hand
- get hold of or seize quickly and easily
= synonyms: snaffle, snap up
- obtain illegally or unscrupulously
